DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to study ovarian reserve after laparoscopic endometrioma cystectomy by measuring antimullerian hormone. The measurements were measured before the surgery and one week and three months after the surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Serial Measurement of Serum Antimullerian Hormone in Women Undergoing Laparoscopic Cystectomy of Endometrioma
DOC.detailed_description: Antimullerian hormone will be obtained in patients with ovarian endometrioma before laparoscopic cystectomy is done. The measurements were compared with antimullerian hormone after one week and three months after the surgery. Forty three patients will be included in this study.
DOC.criteria: 2040 years ovarian endometrioma > or = 3 cms laparoscopic cystectomy treatment previous ovarian surgery other ovarian pathology previous drugs or hormonal treatment for endometrioma
